overview: After a surprise encounter in a presumably empty home, a cunning, meticulous burglar must convince an equally witty little girl that he is her imaginary friend to avoid suspicion. However, his illusion unravels unexpectedly through an exploration of suppressed childlike behaviour and perceived maturity.
tagline: Dress-up and imaginary friends: all in a day's work for your typical house burglar.
title: Sneaking Suspicion
